item.title: Cutting the Ribbon
item.description: Ok can we talk about how crazy this is? Patty Wagstaff is 72 years old at the time of this photo and here she is cutting a ribbon with the tail of her Extra Flugzeugbau EA300 only a few metres above the ground, while INVERTED! Talk about an aviation girlboss! I’ve actually known about Wagstaff for over a decade now thanks to her being featured in the Microsoft Flight Simulator series.
